project_context.key_goal: Streamlined invoicing with multi-company support and e-Factura integration

rules: Use Public Sans for all body text and UI elements.
Use JetBrains Mono for invoice series, numbers, and fiscal codes (CUI).

primary.description: Deep Indigo - Trustworthy but modern. Use for primary buttons and active states.

accent.description: Vibrant Orange - Use SPARINGLY for high-priority conversion actions (e.g., 'New Invoice').

rules: Use white cards on light gray (#f8fafc) background for depth.
Text is never pure black (#000000). Use Slate-900 (#0f172a).

container_rules: Invoice Editor: 'Paper' metaphor - distinct white container with shadow-sm on gray bg.
Cards: Flat with 1px border-slate-200. Hover: shadow-md + border-indigo-100.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-10 px-6 rounded-full shadow-sm transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-slate-700 border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50 h-10 px-6 rounded-full transition-all

cards.interactive: bg-white border border-slate-200 rounded-xl p-6 hover:border-indigo-200 hover:shadow-lg transition-all duration-300 cursor-pointer

inputs.default: h-10 rounded-md border border-slate-200 bg-white px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-primary focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

tables.header: bg-slate-50 text-slate-500 text-xs uppercase tracking-wider font-semibold h-10

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use sparingly for sticky headers: bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-slate-200/50.
visual_enhancers.micro_interactions: All interactive elements must have hover/active states. Lists should stagger-fade in.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Swiss High-Contrast' palette. Light mode is default.
Use 'Manrope' for all headings. Import from Google Fonts.
Use 'Public Sans' for body text. Import from Google Fonts.
Create a 'DashboardLayout' component that includes the Sidebar and Topbar.
Use Shadcn UI components but override styles to match the 'Swiss' aesthetic (sharper corners, distinct borders).
For the Invoice Editor, create a visually distinct 'Paper' container centered on the screen.
Ensure all inputs and buttons have 'data-testid' attributes.
Do NOT use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid colors or subtle noise textures.
Ensure the 'e-Factura' integration panel has a distinct 'Technical/Government' feel (maybe slightly more mono-spaced or bordered).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Avoid generic 'AI slop' aesthetics. Be bold with whitespace.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for sticky headers.
NEVER center align the app container globally.
Always use modern button styles (pill or sharp).
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui.
